title: 'Creature from the Black Lagoon' actor Ricou Browning dies
description: Ricou Browning is best known for playing the Gill Man in the 1954 monster movie.

title: WATCH:  Moose charges at snowmobiler in Idaho
description: A snowmobiler captured the moment a moose suddenly charged toward his brother on a trail in Idaho.

title: Latest Ohio derailment poses no public risk, officials say
description: Authorities in Ohio say there is no indication of any risk to public health from the derailment of a Norfolk Southern cargo train between Dayton and Columbus, the second derailment of a company train in the state in a month

title: 1 dead, 2 seriously injured in plane crash on Long Island
description: One person died and two were seriously injured in a small plane crash on Long Island on Sunday afternoon.

title: Chief: Police in Maryland city fatally shoot man with knife
description: Authorities say police in Frederick, Maryland, fatally shot a man with a knife during a weekend encounter after he ignored commands to drop the weapon

title: University of Massachusetts warns of TikTok drinking trend
description: The University of Massachusetts is warning about a TikTok trend after 28 ambulances were summoned to off-campus parties

title: Buttigieg responds to East Palestine criticism, calls Trump trip 'somewhat maddening'
description: Pete Buttigieg is firing back at Republican critics of his response to the train derailment in East Palestine, Ohio, in a new interview

title: 2 dead, 6 injured in shooting at house party packed with more than 100 teenagers
description: At least two people were killed and six others were injured when gunfire erupted late Saturday night at a suburban Atlanta house party.

title: Scholz: 'consequences' if China sends arms to Russia
description: German chancellor says there would be “consequences” if China sends weapons.

title: Woman gets 12 to 24 years in crash that killed firefighter
description: Three firefighters and a state trooper were struck responding to a crash.

title: Violent protests erupt over train collision in Greece that killed 57
description: Anger over a same-track collision between two trains in Greece that killed nearly 60, erupted in a massive protest Sunday in Athens and led to clashes with police.

title: Fatal shooting erupts at Georgia party with over 100 teens
description: Two people are dead and six others injured after a shooting in a suburban Atlanta home Saturday night where over 100 teenagers had gathered for a party

title: Man, 4 children die in a fire at a northwest Phoenix condo
description: Authorities say two more children have died from their injuries suffered in a northwest Phoenix condominium fire

title: Funeral of Thai 'cave boy' who died in UK ends with prayers
description: Mourners have filled a temple chamber for a final prayer session in northern Thailand for one of the 12 boys rescued from a flooded cave in 2018 who died at school in England last month

title: Death row inmate who acted as own attorney seeks new trial
description: A Tennessee man on death row who was forced to act as his own lawyer is seeking a new trial, claiming multiple violations of his constitutional rights

title: Trump being indicted during 2024 campaign is 'hypothetical,' Sen. Sullivan says
description: Sen. Dan Sullivan on Sunday played down the possibility that Trump could be under indictment while running for president in 2024

title: Biden to travel to Selma for anniversary of 'Bloody Sunday'
description: Biden will speak about the "continued fight for voting rights" at the Edmund Pettus Bridge in Selma, Alabama, on Sunday, the White House said

title: 5 shot at Los Angeles beach, suspects at large
description: Five people were shot after an altercation escalated to gunfire on a beach in San Pedro, a Los Angeles neighborhood, on Saturday evening, officials said.

title: Chinese company rejects rights accusation after US sanctions
description: BGI Group, one of the world’s biggest genetics analysis companies, has said it never would be involved in human rights abuses after the U.S. government said there was a danger some of its units might contribute to Chinese surveillance

title: Crisis over suspected Iran schoolgirl poisonings escalates
description: A crisis over suspected poisonings targeting Iranian schoolgirls is escalating as authorities now acknowledge over 50 schools had been struck in a wave of possible cases

title: 5 people hurt in shooting near site of LA gun buyback event
description: Police in Los Angeles say at least five people were wounded in a shooting at a beach Saturday night, a few miles away from the location of a gun buyback event held earlier in the day by police and a city official

title: Judy Heumann, disability rights activist, dies at age 75
description: Judy Heumann, a renowned activist who helped secure legislation protecting the rights of disabled people, has died at age 75

title: WATCH:  Portable toilet glides down street during Texas storm
description: A portable toilet became an unlikely casualty of a severe storm that brought strong winds to a Texas neighborhood.

title: 20 cars of Norfolk Southern cargo train derail in Ohio
description: It's the second derailment of the company’s trains in Ohio in a month.

title: China sets this year's economic growth target at 'around 5%'
description: It is trying to rebuild business activity after the end of anti-virus controls.

title: Trump will stay in race even if indicted, tells CPAC crowd: 'I am your retribution'
description: Former President Donald Trump closed out CPAC on Saturday and said for the first time that not even a criminal indictment would push him out of the race for president.

title: Republicans torn over reduced CPAC, party divides
description: CPAC attendees were torn over the reduced turnout at this year's event.

title: Bankman-Fried might use flip phone under stricter bail plan
description: Disgraced cryptocurrency entrepreneur barred from smartphone while on bail.

title: Newer drug may be an alternative to help lower heart disease risk, study finds
description: A newer drug may help lower heart disease risk, according to a study.

title: Californians await key decisions from reparations task force
description: What reparations may look like or how much Black Californians may be paid,
